entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 2:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 17 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 17 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
